p: All bioassays were tested with three replications. One-way ANOVA statistical method in Minitab software version 16.2.3 was applied to analyze the raw data. The statistical data including means, standard deviations (SD), and grouping information were obtained and expressed as final outcomes. Various groups indicate significant differences under Turkey’s test at the confidence level of 95%. Pearson’s correlation coefficients between total phenolic and flavonoid contents, antioxidant, anti-tyrosinase, α-amylase, and cytotoxic activities of extracts from A. virginicus were evaluated using the same software.
